article:
'Pilot Magazine (UK)' is a monthly general aviation magazine based in the UK.
They claim 'Britain's best selling GA
magazine'. [http://www.pilotweb.aero/content/info/aboutus.aspx Pilot Web -
About us] The editor, Nick Bloom, is an ex-market researcher, author, and
was British Advanced Aerobatic Champion in 1990 (Pitts Special) and Intermediate
Champion in 1997
(Stampe). [http://www.pilotweb.aero/content/info/theteam.aspx Pilot Web -
About us - The Team] The magazine also operates PilotWeb, on which there
is news, overviews of the magazine, forums and information for beginners in
aviation. [http://www.pilotweb.aero/default.aspx PilotWeb] (see
[http://www.pilotweb.aero/content/articles/article_list.aspx?type=7 Reviews],
[http://www.pilotweb.aero/cs/forums/ Forums] and
[http://www.pilotweb.aero/content/getting_started/article_list.aspx?type=9
Getting Started]) The magazine is a part of Archant Specialist, from
Archant Publishing. [http://www.archant.co.uk/business_specialist.aspx
Archant Specialist]
